C

Camera - Class in dillon.gameEngine.scroller
This object tells the Scroll manager where the camera is so it can render the correct tiles.

CanvasController - Class in dillon.gameEngine.core
This class is in control of the game's canvas.

checkCollision() - Method in class dillon.gameEngine.entity.Entity
This method will check if the player is colliding with anything.
clearBlackout() - Static method in class dillon.gameEngine.gui.guiManager
This cancels the blackout.
ClientConnector - Class in dillon.gameEngine.networking
This class bridges the gap between the central server and the client.

Tells the engine to connect to a server.
Core - Class in dillon.gameEngine.core
Core file that has starting and stopping methods.

crash(Exception) - Method in class dillon.gameEngine.core.CanvasController
This method crashes the game and produces a stacktrace onto the screen.
crash(Exception) - Static method in class dillon.gameEngine.core.Core
This method shuts off the event system and activates CanvasController's Crash to stop the engine.
